entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain mixed with snow late in the afternoon. Fog spreading inland. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
